text: A quick H2O data wrangling benchmark update. It now introduced handling of missing values in the tests. The test suite uncovered several bugs in different ecosystems that are much more mature than DataFrames.jl and interestingly no bugs in Julia :smile: (see <https://github.com/h2oai/db-benchmark/issues/40#issuecomment-747919633> for details).
